channel.title: My Banners
channel.description:
I'm a Photoshop intermediate user, i took a few classes on it during the cs3 era. I would like to make a banner for any user who requests, move this to the right section if this does not belong. Show off: [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/3793/bannerpy.png[/img] this image was made to look old, it does look good without the effects as well if you would like me to upload [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/4723/sdfrtghyuji.jpg[/img] btw fo andrew [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/7999/asdfgghj.png[/img] Fo nick [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/7840/dertyui.png[/img] minecraft [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9575/minecraftcq.png[/img] btw this is not to advertise, note that there is no server by this name and the url of a website is non-existent.
[font=arial][size=24pt]PSDs (my banners are free to edit, no credits to me necessary, but are requested).[/size][/font] Aarad let me use this site to upload my psd's but i used bit.ly just to make sure im not advertising. http://bit.ly/elFkN7
[url=http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/carbon/phyber/]this[/url] is the font i used

item.title: My Banners
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=485155.msg3555400#msg3555400 date=1301852943]

[/img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/7999/asdfgghj.png[/img]
Fo nick
[/img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/7840/dertyui.png[/img]

A little C&C for each.

  1. The reflection for the text doesn’t flow with the signature. Your signature is dynamically flat, then you try to add that reflective effect and it all falls apart. If you replace your reflection with an effectively blended C4D, the signature will have more depth and you won’t have to fill the space with something unnecessary.

  2. The banner is F2P! Lets keep it that way! Yet, you have members items sitting on the picture. Members with common knowledge of runescape will think “well that’s a misleading image”. The pink is the focal point but it doesn’t blend with the rest of the image. Your snakeskin pattern (or whatever it may be) on the text makes it look ugly as well.

This is just criticism, don’t come to me and yell “well if you can do better, make one faggot”. Take it or leave it.
[/quote]It’s the stained glass filter effect, and I don’t like it that much either.[/quote]
no, i dont use adobe filter effects, except blurring is a big part in these images.

http://bit.ly/elFkN7

those are my images, a friend uploaded them to the page for me.

Read full topic

Fo nick
[/img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/7840/dertyui.png[/img]
[/quote]

A little C&C for each.

  1. The reflection for the text doesn’t flow with the signature. Your signature is dynamically flat, then you try to add that reflective effect and it all falls apart. If you replace your reflection with an effectively blended C4D, the signature will have more depth and you won’t have to fill the space with something unnecessary.

  2. The banner is F2P! Lets keep it that way! Yet, you have members items sitting on the picture. Members with common knowledge of runescape will think “well that’s a misleading image”. The pink is the focal point but it doesn’t blend with the rest of the image. Your snakeskin pattern (or whatever it may be) on the text makes it look ugly as well.

This is just criticism, don’t come to me and yell “well if you can do better, make one faggot”. Take it or leave it.[/quote]lol thnx

Read full topic

item.title: My Banners
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

@LilXCj Not everybody knows C4D, other than that yeah. The text should be 3D. Also the snake skin pattern is a render in Photoshop called Glass or Tiles. Don’t remember. Also do not make in everything you make repetitive. Have a different style in designing it everytime.

Read full topic

item.title: My Banners
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:12, topic:389234”][/img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/7999/asdfgghj.png[/img]
Fo nick
[/img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/7840/dertyui.png[/img][/quote]

A little C&C for each.

  1. The reflection for the text doesn’t flow with the signature. Your signature is dynamically flat, then you try to add that reflective effect and it all falls apart. If you replace your reflection with an effectively blended C4D, the signature will have more depth and you won’t have to fill the space with something unnecessary.

  2. The banner is F2P! Lets keep it that way! Yet, you have members items sitting on the picture. Members with common knowledge of runescape will think “well that’s a misleading image”. The pink is the focal point but it doesn’t blend with the rest of the image. Your snakeskin pattern (or whatever it may be) on the text makes it look ugly as well.

This is just criticism, don’t come to me and yell “well if you can do better, make one faggot”. Take it or leave it.

Read full topic
